lead_paragraph: Red Bull's Daniel Ricciardo has put his Monaco misery behind him and is hoping for another epic battle with Lewis Hamilton in Montreal this weekend.

headline.print_headline: Recharged Ricciardo Can Be a Handful for Hamilton
headline.main: Recharged Ricciardo Can Be a Handful for Hamilton

snippet: Red Bull's Daniel Ricciardo has put his Monaco misery behind him and is hoping for another epic battle with Lewis Hamilton in Montreal this weekend....
